scripts.hackmyresume:build: hackmyresume -d build src/base.json TO dist/base.html --theme ./src/fresh-theme-henlo && node ./scripts/generate-pdf.js ./dist/base.html ./dist/base.pdf
scripts.hackmyresume:dist: hackmyresume build src/base.json src/private-*.json TO dist/resume.html --theme ./src/fresh-theme-henlo && node ./scripts/generate-pdf.js ./dist/resume.html ./dist/resume.pdf
